<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Cackle](/Spells.aspx?ID=792)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Hex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=324" />
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=323" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 237 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Free Action" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

With a quick burst of laughter, you prolong a magical effect you created. You Sustain a Spell.
name: Cackle
